statements: SELECT post_id, post_content, post_likes, post_comments FROM posts;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_likes > 100;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM posts ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_likes FROM posts WHERE post_id = 5;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_likes, post_comments FROM posts WHERE post_comments < 10;
SELECT post_content, post_likes FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_likes, post_comments, post_content FROM posts WHERE post_likes > 100 ORDER BY post_comments DESC;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_id BETWEEN 3 AND 5 AND post_likes < 50 ORDER BY post_likes ASC, post_comments DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_likes, post_content FROM posts WHERE post_content LIKE '%important%' OR post_comments > 10 ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_comments, post_likes FROM posts WHERE post_likes IN (10, 20, 30) AND post_comments < 5 ORDER BY post_likes DESC, post_comments ASC;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_content, likes_count FROM posts WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT username, join_date FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT post_content, comments_count FROM posts WHERE post_id = 2;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT username, join_date FROM users WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01' AND username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, post_content, likes_count FROM posts WHERE user_id = 3 AND likes_count > 100 ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM posts
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes FROM posts
SELECT post_id, post_content, comments FROM posts WHERE likes > 100
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email = 'test@example.com'
SELECT * FROM engagements WHERE action = 'like'
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY post_id ASC;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE comments < 10 ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments FROM posts WHERE likes >= 50 AND comments > 20 ORDER BY post_id ASC, comments DESC;
SELECT * FROM engagements WHERE action = 'like';
SELECT users.username, posts.post_content FROM users INNER JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.post_id ORDER BY users.username ASC, posts.post_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_content, likes, comments FROM posts;
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_content, likes FROM posts ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT post_id, comments FROM posts WHERE comments > 10;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes, comments FROM posts WHERE user_id = 'abc123';
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT posts.post_id, posts.post_content, likes, comments, username FROM posts JOIN users ON posts.user_id = users.user_id WHERE users.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT users.username, COUNT(posts.post_id) AS total_posts FROM users LEFT JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id GROUP BY users.username ORDER BY total_posts DESC;

SELECT post_id, post_content, likes, comments, comment_content FROM posts LEFT JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id WHERE comments.comment_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY posts.post_id ASC, comments.comment_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM posts;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM likes WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, user_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE post_id = 3 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT engagement_id, engagement_type FROM engagements WHERE engagement_type = 'like';
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_content, likes_count FROM posts ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_content, comments_count FROM posts WHERE post_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, engagement_type FROM engagements WHERE engagement_type = 'comment';
